languages.text: Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} и сможете сокрушить врага. Чтобы узнать подробности о том, как работают пассивные способности кораблей, наведете курсор на иконку интересующего вас эффекта на панели {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше урона и сможете сокрушить врага.
Чтобы узнать подробности о том, как работают пассивные способности кораблей, наведете курсор на иконку интересующего вас эффекта в очереди инициативы.

languages.text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.
languages.original_text: Похоже, дальние атаки по кораблям друкари не так эффективны — все дело в Теневом поле, что окружает вражеские суда! Смените тактику боя и попробуйте атаковать их вблизи — так вы нанесете больше {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} и сможете сокрушить врага. Чтобы узнать подробности о том, как работают пассивные способности кораблей, наведете курсор на иконку интересующего вас эффекта на панели {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}очередности{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you in the initiative tracker and hover your cursor over its icon.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you in the initiative tracker and hover your cursor over its icon.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you in the initiative tracker and hover your cursor over its icon.

Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more damage and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you in the initiative tracker and hover your cursor over its icon.

languages.text: 黑暗灵族的舰船藏身于暗影领域之中。因此，远距离开火的命中率并不理想。您可以尝试改变战术，近距离攻击他们的舰船。 这样一来，您便可以造成更多{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，将敌人碾为齑粉。若要了解更多关于舰船被动能力的细节，请在{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}行动顺序{/g}栏中选择您感兴趣的效果，之后将鼠标悬停在效果图标上。
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.

traits.locale_text: 黑暗灵族的舰船藏身于暗影领域之中。因此，远距离开火的命中率并不理想。{g|Encyclopedia:Range}{/g}您可以尝试改变战术，近距离攻击他们的舰船。这样一来，您便可以造成更多伤害，将敌人碾为齑粉。 若要了解更多关于舰船被动{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}的细节，请在行动顺序栏中选择您感兴趣的{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}，之后将鼠标悬停在效果图标上。

languages.text: デュカーリ艦への長距離攻撃は、艦周辺に巡らされたシャドウフィールドに阻まれる。効果は薄い。至近距離から攻撃するなど、戦術を変えてみよう 。そうすればより多くの{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、敵を粉砕することができる。 船のパッシブアビリティについては、{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}優先度{/g}パネルで興味のある効果を探し、そのアイコンにカーソルを合わせて確かめよう。
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.

traits.locale_text: デュカーリ艦への長{g|Encyclopedia:Range}距離{/g}攻撃は、艦周辺に巡らされたシャドウフィールドに阻まれる。効果は薄い。至近距離から攻撃するなど、戦術を変えてみよう 。そうすればより多くのダメージを与え、敵を粉砕することができる。 船のパッシブ{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}については、イニシアティブトラッカーで興味のある{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を探し、そのアイコンにカーソルを合わせて確かめよう。

languages.text: Los ataques de largo alcance contra naves Drukhari son menos efectivos debido al Campo de sombra que los envuelve. Prueba a cambiar de táctica atacándolos desde cerca: causarás más {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} y te será más fácil vencer al enemigo. Para saber más sobre cómo funcionan las capacidades pasivas de las naves, busca el efecto que te suscite interés en el panel de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}prioridad{/g} y mantén el cursor sobre su icono.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de largo {g|Encyclopedia:Range}alcance{/g} contra naves Drukhari son menos efectivos debido al Campo de sombra que los envuelve. Prueba a cambiar de táctica atacándolos desde cerca. Causarás más daño y te será más fácil vencer al enemigo. Para saber más sobre cómo funcionan las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} pasivas de las naves, busca el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} que te suscite interés en el cuadro de iniciativa y mantén el cursor sobre su icono.

languages.text: Fernkampfangriffe gegen Drukhari-Schiffe sind wegen des Schattenfeldes, das sie umgibt, weniger effektiv. Versuche, deine Taktik zu ändern, indem du sie aus der Nähe angreifst – so kannst du mehr {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} anrichten und den Feind ausschalten. Um mehr darüber zu erfahren, wie die passiven Fähigkeiten von Schiffen funktionieren, suche im {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}Priorität{/g}-Fenster den Effekt, der dich interessiert, und bewege den Mauszeiger über sein Symbol.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffe{/g} gegen Drukhari-Schiffe sind wegen des Schattenfeldes, das sie umgibt, weniger effektiv. Versuche, deine Taktik zu ändern, indem du sie aus der Nähe angreifst — so kannst du mehr Schaden anrichten und den Feind vernichten. Um mehr darüber zu erfahren, wie die passiven {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} von Schiffen funktionieren, suche im Initiative-Tracker den {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g}, der dich interessiert, und bewege den Mauszeiger über sein Symbol.

languages.text: Les attaques longue portée contre les vaisseaux Drukhari sont moins efficaces en raison du Champ d'Ombres qui les enveloppe. Essayez de changer de tactique en les attaquant à bout portant. Vous pourrez ainsi infliger plus de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} et écraser l'ennemi. Pour connaître le fonctionnement des capacités passives du vaisseau, recherchez l'effet qui vous intéresse dans le panneau de{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priorité{/g} et passez le curseur sur son icône.
languages.original_text: Long-range attacks against Drukhari ships are less effective due to the Shadow Field that surrounds them. Try changing your tactics by attacking them at close range — that way you can deal more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} and crush the enemy. To learn more about how passive abilities of ships work, find the effect that interests you on the {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleInitiativeGlossary}priority{/g} panel and hover your cursor over its icon.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques longue {g|Encyclopedia:Range}portée{/g} contre les vaisseaux Drukhari sont moins efficaces en raison du Champ d'Ombres qui les enveloppe. Essayez de changer de tactique en les attaquant à bout portant. Vous pourrez ainsi infliger plus de dégâts et écraser l'ennemi. Pour connaître le fonctionnement des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} passives du vaisseau, recherchez l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} qui vous intéresse dans le traqueur d'initiative et passez le curseur sur son icône.
